thread.title: Parkland Teacher Opposes Trump’s Call to Arm Educators

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Parkland Teacher Opposes Trump’s Call to Arm Educators
text:
A teacher who sheltered 65 students in her classroom during the Feb. 14 shooting in Parkland, Fla. said Sunday she opposed President Donald Trump’s call to arm school personnel.
Ashley Kurth said on ABC’s “This Week” she worries students could find a way to get their hands on the firearms.
“I have a 7-year-old, and I would not feel comfortable... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
